subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart drove away with his fifth victory in seven starts in the Nationwide series this year, finishing ahead of Denny Hamlin and Kyle Busch, his Joe Gibbs Racing teammates, in the Camping World R.V. Sales 200 at New Hampshire Motor Speedway.
snippet: Tony Stewart drove away with his fifth victory in seven starts in the Nationwide series this year, finishing ahead of Denny Hamlin and Kyle Busch, his Joe Gibbs Racing teammates, in the Camping World R.V. Sales 200 at New Hampshire Motor Speedway.
